attributes.action: Extend the date on the certificate for a year for practical driving test.
attributes.additional_details: It is so unfair to be asked to sit a theory test again if you had enough time to do your practical driving test but can't do it because the test centres are closed and only allow key workers to do their practical driving test. Some people's date on the certificate will expire . It is not their fault. Covid19 will not allow people to do things according to their plans
attributes.background: To extend the date on the certificate for the people who were supposed to take their practical driving test but can't because of the test centre closure. This is because of Covid19. Some people's date on the certificate will expire soon and they might be asked to sit the theory test again.

rejection.details:
We think this petition is similar:
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/307479
